abstract: Two more big companies — the Hartford Financial Services Group and Discover Financial Services — are preparing to pay back the billions of dollars that they received from the government’s banking bailout.
snippet: Two more big companies — the Hartford Financial Services Group and Discover Financial Services — are preparing to pay back the billions of dollars that they received from the government’s banking bailout.
lead_paragraph: 7:41 p.m. | Updated Two more big companies — the Hartford Financial Services Group and Discover Financial Services — are preparing to pay back the billions of dollars that they received from the government’s banking bailout.

headline.main: Hartford and Discover to Repay TARP Money
